languages.text: "Разлучать семью — это так жестоко. Скоро вы увидитесь на том свете".
"To separate a family would be cruel. You and your son will see each other soon enough."
languages.original_text: "Разлучать семью — это так жестоко. Скоро вы увидитесь на том свете".

traits.locale_text: "To separate a family is just cruel. You will see each other in the next world soon."
"To separate a family is just cruel. You will see each other in the next world soon."
"To separate a family is just cruel. You will see each other in the next world soon enough."
"To separate a family is just cruel. You will see each other in the next world soon enough."
"To separate a family would be cruel. You and your son will see each other soon enough."
"To separate a family would be cruel. You and your son will see each other soon enough."

languages.text: "Eine Familie zu trennen, wäre grausam. Ihr und Euer Sohn werdet einander früh genug wiedersehen."
languages.original_text: "To separate a family would be cruel. You and your son will see each other soon enough."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Familie zu trennen, wäre grausam. Ihr und Euer Sohn werdet einander früh genug wiedersehen."

languages.text: «Separar a una familia sería una crueldad. Usted y su hijo se reunirán muy pronto».
languages.original_text: "To separate a family would be cruel. You and your son will see each other soon enough."

traits.locale_text: «Separar a una familia sería una crueldad. Usted y su hijo se reunirán muy pronto».

languages.text: 「親子を引き離すのは残酷なことだ。君と息子はすぐに会わせてやる」
languages.original_text: "To separate a family would be cruel. You and your son will see each other soon enough."

traits.locale_text: 「親子を引き離すのは残酷なことだ。君と息子はすぐに会わせてやる」

languages.text: “拆散别人的家庭实在是太残忍了。别急，你和你儿子很快就能见面了。”
languages.original_text: "To separate a family would be cruel. You and your son will see each other soon enough."

traits.locale_text: “拆散别人的家庭实在是太残忍了。别急，你和你儿子很快就能见面了。”

languages.text: « Je m'en voudrais de séparer une famille. Votre fils et vous serez bientôt réunis. »
languages.original_text: "To separate a family would be cruel. You and your son will see each other soon enough."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'en voudrais de séparer une famille. Votre fils et vous serez bientôt réunis. »

languages.text: "Aile üyelerini birbirinden ayırmak zalimce olur. Sen ve oğlun çok yakında birbirinizi yeniden göreceksiniz."
languages.original_text: "To separate a family would be cruel. You and your son will see each other soon enough."
